name: Zen (itch) (Sisyphean Games)
description:
Watch the patterns made by the movement of the black and white orbs to find the hidden word. Entering this word will complete the puzzle and unlock the next. 

It's not timed, there is no need to rush; just watch until it becomes clear.

Enjoy

It might take a moment to load after clicking play.
If the game is running slow please try out the windows version
